Package org.uma.evolver.parameter.type

Class IntegerParameter

java.lang.Object
org.uma.evolver.parameter.Parameter<Integer>
org.uma.evolver.parameter.type.RangeParameter<Integer>
org.uma.evolver.parameter.type.IntegerParameter
public class IntegerParameter extends RangeParameter<Integer>
A parameter representing an int value constrained within a specified inclusive range.

This class is a concrete implementation of RangeParameter for the Integer type. It supports parsing from command-line arguments and ensures the value falls within the specified range.

Example usage: 


 IntegerParameter param = new IntegerParameter("iterations", 1, 100);
 param.parse(new String[] { "--iterations", "50" });
 Integer value = param.value(); // 50
Author:
Antonio J. Nebro

    • IntegerParameter

      public IntegerParameter(String name, int lowerBound, int upperBound)
      Constructs an IntegerParameter with the given name and range.
      Parameters:
      name - the parameter name
      lowerBound - the inclusive lower bound
      upperBound - the inclusive upper bound
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any argument is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if lowerBound >= upperBound
